entry.title: WIND WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 09:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: S 16 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
